title: How to Find the Mirage Island in Blox Fruits Sea: Easy & Fast

steps.title: Sail a boat in Sea Danger Zones 1-6 of the Third Sea.
steps.content: Sail a boat in Sea Danger Zones 1-6 of the Third Sea. Although you can find Mirage Island in zones 1-6, your chances are best in zone 5 since Sea Events spawn more frequently as you increase zones. [1] X Research source Update 20 changed how Mirage Island appears; instead of increasing the chances per player on a ship, Mirage Island appears based on the number of ships in an area. Mirage Island despawns if: 15 minutes have passed. The player who spawned the island isn't close. The player who spawned the island leaves.

steps.title: Find this NPC in a random spawn location.
steps.content: Find this NPC in a random spawn location. The Advanced Fruit Dealer sells different stock than the normal Blox Fruit dealer, and you can buy rarer fruits from this NPC. Don't worry about server-hopping to find better deals! The Advanced Fruit Dealer's stock is the same across servers. The advantages of the Advanced Fruit Dealer are: Minimum of 7 fruits in stock (like Rocket and Spin). Higher chance of Legendary Fruits (Fruits worth more than 1 million). Restock takes 2 hours. This NPC spawns in different locations around the island. [2] X Research source

steps.title: You have to have the Sealed King quest, and it must be night.
steps.content: You have to have the Sealed King quest, and it must be night. Although the Blue Gear does not have a set spawn location, it only appears at night. Don't worry if you find the island during the day, though! You'll have enough time to wait for nightfall and still have a few minutes to find the gear. You won't be able to continue with the Sealed King quest if you don't have the Mirror Fractal in your inventory.

steps.title: Can I find Mirage Island on any night or just during a full moon?
steps.content: Can I find Mirage Island on any night or just during a full moon? Mirage Island spawns during the day and night, not just on nights with a full moon.

steps.title: What's the quickest way to find Mirage Island?
steps.content: What's the quickest way to find Mirage Island? Sail a boat in Danger Zone 5 for increased chances at finding Mirage Island.

steps.title: What rewards are on Mirage Island?
steps.content: What rewards are on Mirage Island? Not only can you find the Advanced Fruit Dealer and the Blue Gear, but you can also find Mirage Chests and Fragment Chests! Go ahead and look for treasure even if you don't need to talk to the NPC or get the gear for a quest.
